skill.name: Crippling Wave
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Unleash a series of large sweeping attacks that deal 155% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies in front of you.

Every third hit also dazes enemies within 11 yards, slowing their movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Sweeping punches that cripple enemies, reducing their attack and movement speed.

rune.name: Tsunami
rune.description:
Crippling Wave's third attack has its range increased to 17 yards and Freezes enemies for 1 second.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Crippling Wave's third attack has increased range and Freezes enemies.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Cyclone Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Pull up to 16 enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 261% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Mystical force pulls nearby enemies towards you and blasts them.

rune.name: Soothing Breeze
rune.description:
Cyclone Strike heals you and all allies within 24 yards for 31036 Life.

Heal amount is increased by 17% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.
rune.simpleDescription: Cyclone Strike heals you and your allies.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Soothing Mist
rune.description:
Imbue yourself with water, causing your abilities to heal yourself and allies within 30 yards for 16093 Life.

Heal amount is increased by 4% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.
rune.simpleDescription: Imbue yourself with water, causing your abilities to heal yourself and nearby allies.

skill.name: Inner Sanctuary
skill.description:
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Create a runic circle of protection on the ground for 6 seconds that reduces all damage taken by 55% for all allies inside.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Create a runic circle of protection that reduces all damage taken for all allies inside.

rune.name: Safe Haven
rune.description:
Allies inside Inner Sanctuary are healed for 35779 every second.

Heal amount is increased by 7% of your Life per Second.
rune.simpleDescription: Allies inside Inner Sanctuary are healed every second.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 3 seconds. Elite enemies recover faster, but suffer a 30% chance to miss with attacks.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Blind all nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

rune.name: Crippling Light
rune.description: Enemies that are Blinded deal 25% reduced damage for 5 seconds after the Blind wears off.
rune.simpleDescription: Enemies that are Blinded deal reduced damage after the Blind wears off.

skill.name: Mantra of Salvation
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain an additional 20% increased resistance to all elements for 3 seconds.

Passive: You and your allies within 60 yards gain 20% increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain greatly increased resistance to all elements.

Passive: You and nearby allies gain increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Agility
rune.description: Passive: Mantra of Salvation also increases Dodge Chance by 35%.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Mantra of Salvation also increases Dodge Chance.

skill.name: Resolve
skill.description: Damage you deal reduces enemy damage by 20% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: "It is not our place to make demands of nature, nor to acquiesce to those who would. First we learn what is right, then we protect what is right." —Master Wughan

skill.name: Unity
skill.description: Each ally affected by your Mantras increases your damage by 5%, up to a maximum of 20%, and has 5% increased damage.
skill.flavor: "I thought I was done for, trampled into the snow. Suddenly I felt her hand on my shoulder. The warmth returned to my bones, and together we repelled the beasts." —Legends of the North

skill.name: Near Death Experience
skill.description:
When receiving fatal damage, you instead restore 35% Life and 35% Spirit and are immune to damage and control impairing effects for 2 seconds.

This effect may occur once every 60 seconds.
skill.flavor: "We do not see what has been done, we only see what remains to be done." —Mantra of the Monks of Ivgorod

skill.name: Beacon of Ytar
skill.flavor: It is only through hardship that we come to know our limits, and only through knowing our limits that we learn to shatter them.

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Intervene
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Taunt enemies within 10 yards of you for 3 seconds when you are hit.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Taunt enemies near you when you are hit.

skill.name: Intimidate
skill.description: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed by 80% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.

skill.name: Poison Bolts
skill.description:
Cooldown: 3 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 320% weapon damage and an additional 100% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 3 seconds

Shoots a deadly poisoned bolt.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stun enemies.

skill.name: Anatomy
skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1.8% for you and the Scoundrel.
skill.simpleDescription: Increases Critical Hit Chance for you and the Scoundrel.
